REPERTOIRE & EVENTS

Katherine's beautiful and emotional singing will provide a bespoke,
stylish and elegant soundtrack for your event.
She is available to perform at weddings, opera galas,
funerals and memorials and corporate events.


Her attention to detail and level of expertise will ensure
that you and your guests enjoy a truly memorable and unforgettable day.
Katherine will work with you to devise a bespoke musical programme
that is perfect to complement your event.


With her wealth of musical knowledge and her network
of trusted professional musicians, she can provide a professional pianist,
organist, string quartet or indeed other singers
to form an opera duo, trio or a capella quartet.


Katherine is based in the South East but she is able to perform
both UK nationwide and Internationally.


Below is just an example of my current repertoire,
but please contact me for a more extensive list or with any special requests.
Katherine is able to perform classical, Opera arias,
Broadway musicals, Jazz, pop or folk songs.
Just get in touch with your request here.


Please contact me for bookings and more information.

REPERTOIRE
